title: Creamy Spinach Casserole
directions: In a saucepan, combine celery soup, flour, butter or margarine, garlic salt, salt and pepper, spinach and onion.  Whisk together and cook over medium heat until hot and thick.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup
2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
